text: "Finna Get Loose" is a song written by and performed by American rapper Sean "Puff Daddy" Combs and American singer Pharrell Williams. Produced by Pharrell, it was released on June 28, 2015 as the first single of Combs' upcoming sixth studio album No Way Out 2. == Music video == The music video directed by Hype Williams, the clip opens in stark black and white. The video was released on August 31, 2015 at Vevo and YouTube. ==Commercial performance== "Finna Get Loose" debut for the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs entering the chart at number 44. Its chart debut was supported by first-week digital download sales of 26,000 copies, along with 446,000 domestic streams. The song entering at number 15 on Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles. == Track listing == *Digital download #"Finna Get Loose" — 3:59 == Charts == ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |} ==References== Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Sean Combs songs Category:Pharrell Williams songs Category:Bad Boy Records singles Category:Epic Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Hype Williams Category:Songs written by Sean Combs Category:Songs written by Pharrell Williams
